channel.title: Tx1 on Rico.ai
channel.description: Recent content in Tx1 on Rico.ai

item.title: ROS Intel Euclid Install on Nvidia Jeston TX1
item.description: Modify the kernal for uvcvideo git clone https://github.com/jetsonhacks/installLibrealsenseTX1.git cd installLibrealsenseTX1 Modify the address to use the Euclid libRealsense Modify the address to use the Euclid version of libRealSense https://github.com/IntelEuclid/librealsense ./installLibrealsense Make sure the folder $HOME/librealsense does not exist. If it does, delete the file. sudo apt install motion Get Motion Installed wget https://github.com/Motion-Project/motion/releases/download/release-4.2/xenial_motion_4.2-1_amd64.deb sudo apt-get install xenial_motion_4.2-1_amd64.deb Install ROS git clone https://github.com/jetsonhacks/installROSTX1.git cd installROSTX1 ./installROSTX1 -p ros-kinetic-desktop-full .
